vernac_cmds: Inductive FV (z : vari) : tm -> Prop := | FV_abs : forall e : tm, FV z e -> forall v : vari, z <> v -> forall t : ty, FV z (abs v t e) | FV_fix : forall e : tm, FV z e -> forall v : vari, z <> v -> forall t : ty, FV z (Fix v t e) | FV_appl1 : forall e_1 e_2 : tm, FV z e_1 -> FV z (appl e_1 e_2) | FV_appl2 : forall e_1 e_2 : tm, FV z e_2 -> FV z (appl e_1 e_2) | FV_cond1 : forall e_1 e_2 e_3 : tm, FV z e_1 -> FV z (cond e_1 e_2 e_3) | FV_cond2 : forall e_1 e_2 e_3 : tm, FV z e_2 -> FV z (cond e_1 e_2 e_3) | FV_cond3 : forall e_1 e_2 e_3 : tm, FV z e_3 -> FV z (cond e_1 e_2 e_3) | FV_var : forall v : vari, z = v -> FV z (var v) | FV_succ : forall e : tm, FV z e -> FV z (succ e) | FV_prd : forall e : tm, FV z e -> FV z (prd e) | FV_is_o : forall e : tm, FV z e -> FV z (is_o e) | FV_closa : forall (v : vari) (t : ty) (e e_1 : tm), FV z e_1 -> FV z (clos e v t e_1) | FV_closb : forall (v : vari) (t : ty) (e e_1 : tm), FV z e -> z <> v -> FV z (clos e v t e_1).
Goal forall (x v : vari) (t : ty) (e : tm), ~ FV x (abs v t e) -> x = v \/ ~ FV x e.
specialize (Xmidvar x v); simple induction 1; intro A.
right; red in |- *; intro; apply H; apply FV_abs; assumption.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e1 e2 : tm), ~ FV v (appl e1 e2) -> ~ FV v e1 /\ ~ FV v e2.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_appl1; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_appl2; assumption.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e1 e2 e3 : tm), ~ FV v (cond e1 e2 e3) -> ~ FV v e1 /\ ~ FV v e2 /\ ~ FV v e3.
intros v e1 e2 e3 N.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_cond1; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_cond2; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_cond3; assumption.
Goal forall v x : vari, ~ FV v (var x) -> v <> x.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_var; assumption.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e : tm), ~ FV v (succ e) -> ~ FV v e.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_succ; assumption.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e : tm), ~ FV v (prd e) -> ~ FV v e.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_prd; assumption.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e : tm), ~ FV v (is_o e) -> ~ FV v e.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_is_o; assumption.
Goal forall (x v : vari) (t : ty) (e : tm), ~ FV x (Fix v t e) -> x = v \/ ~ FV x e.
specialize (Xmidvar x v); simple induction 1; intro A.
right; red in |- *; intro; apply H; apply FV_fix; assumption.
Goal forall (x v : vari) (t : ty) (e a : tm), ~ FV x (clos e v t a) -> ~ FV x a /\ (x = v \/ ~ FV x e).
red in |- *; intro; apply H; apply FV_closa; assumption.
specialize (Xmidvar x v); simple induction 1; intro A.
right; red in |- *; intro; apply H; apply FV_closb; assumption.

Definition fv (v : vari) (e : tm) := match e return Prop with | o => False | ttt => False | fff => False | abs y s e => FV v e /\ v <> y | appl e1 e2 => FV v e1 \/ FV v e2 | cond e1 e2 e3 => FV v e1 \/ FV v e2 \/ FV v e3 | var y => v = y | succ n => FV v n | prd n => FV v n | is_o n => FV v n | Fix y s e => FV v e /\ v <> y | clos e y s e1 => FV v e1 \/ FV v e /\ v <> y end.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e : tm), FV v e -> fv v e.
Goal forall v : vari, ~ FV v o.
intro v; red in |- *; intro F.
Goal forall v : vari, ~ FV v ttt.
intro v; red in |- *; intro F.
Goal forall v : vari, ~ FV v fff.
intro v; red in |- *; intro F.
Goal forall (v x : vari) (t : ty) (e : tm), FV v (abs x t e) -> FV v e /\ v <> x.
intros v x t e F.
change (fv v (abs x t e)) in |- *.
Goal forall (v x : vari) (t : ty) (e : tm), FV v (Fix x t e) -> FV v e /\ v <> x.
intros v x t e F.
change (fv v (Fix x t e)) in |- *.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e1 e2 : tm), FV v (appl e1 e2) -> FV v e1 \/ FV v e2.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e1 e2 e3 : tm), FV v (cond e1 e2 e3) -> FV v e1 \/ FV v e2 \/ FV v e3.
intros v e1 e2 e3 F.
change (fv v (cond e1 e2 e3)) in |- *.
Goal forall v x : vari, FV v (var x) -> v = x.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e : tm), FV v (succ e) -> FV v e.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e : tm), FV v (prd e) -> FV v e.
Goal forall (v : vari) (e : tm), FV v (is_o e) -> FV v e.
Goal forall (v x : vari) (t : ty) (e a : tm), FV v (clos e x t a) -> FV v a \/ FV v e /\ v <> x.
intros v x t e a F.
change (fv v (clos e x t a)) in |- *.

command: specialize (Xmidvar x v); simple induction 1; intro A.
right; red in |- *; intro; apply H; apply FV_abs; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_appl1; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_appl2; assumption.
intros v e1 e2 e3 N.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_cond1; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_cond2; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_cond3; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_var; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_succ; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_prd; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply N; apply FV_is_o; assumption.
specialize (Xmidvar x v); simple induction 1; intro A.
right; red in |- *; intro; apply H; apply FV_fix; assumption.
red in |- *; intro; apply H; apply FV_closa; assumption.
specialize (Xmidvar x v); simple induction 1; intro A.
right; red in |- *; intro; apply H; apply FV_closb; assumption.
intro v; red in |- *; intro F.
intro v; red in |- *; intro F.
intro v; red in |- *; intro F.
intros v x t e F.
change (fv v (abs x t e)) in |- *.
intros v x t e F.
change (fv v (Fix x t e)) in |- *.
intros v e1 e2 e3 F.
change (fv v (cond e1 e2 e3)) in |- *.
intros v x t e a F.
change (fv v (clos e x t a)) in |- *.
